pubinfo.pubplace: 90 Throckmorton Ave, #26, Mill Valley, CA, 94941, US

descript.abstract: Land parcels in Merced County, California, 2006.
descript.supplinf: The digital data contained on this CD is intended for "planning" purposes only. This data is intended to accurately represent the information that it portrays. These data sets are not guaranteed to represent the current, up to date documents that they depict. The data contained herein is representational in nature and should not be used to assessment or legal purposes. Also, this data is not to be construed for purposes of zoning or subdivision of land. When necessary, contact MDSS, or the source agency (as identified in the file metadata.txt in the appropriate directory) for verification of the data. Quantitatively, the positional accuracy of the parcel layer for the urban areas is +/- 5 feet and +/- 40 for rural areas of the county. For the urban areas, the centerline file was used to match up the parcel pages. This centerline file was created from aerial photos, which were calibrated using known control points. For the rural areas, U.S.G.S Quads were used to match up the parcel pages. These Quads have inherent positional accuracies of +/- 40 feet.

idinfo.useconst: Use with permission from MDSS. Data are licensed to Princeton University-affiliated persons only.

distinfo.custom: Data Request Form Please fill out this form and return by mail or by FAX to the following: ATTN: Rich Green Merced Data Special Services, Inc 369 W. 18th Street Merced, CA 95340 FAX# (209) 723-0322 Please Print or type: Contact Name: Agency Name: Address: City, State, Zip Phone Number: Email Address: Fax Number: Date: Select Subscription ] SubscriptionFee* # of UpdatesPer Year Annual Cost* Monthly Subscription $150.00 per month 12 $1800.00 Quarterly Subscription $375.00 per quarter 4 $1500.00 Bi-Annual Subscription $600.00 bi-annually 2 $1200.00 Yearly/Single Purchase $1000.00 1 $1000.00 * Price includes standard shipping via U.S. Postal Service. Shipping Method All CD's will be shipped via U.S. Postal Service and will take 3-5 working days. An additional fee of $10 per shipment will be charged if Federal Express, Next Day service is requested. Please check one box to verify shipping method. All Subscription shipments will be made on or about the 15th of the month. U.S. Postal Service, 3-5 day (free) Federal Express, Next Day ($25 per shipment) Authorization to Proceed By signing below and returning a copy to MDSS, I authorize MDSS to proceed with the provisions of the digital products as defined above and agree to reimburse funds to MDSS for the full amount quoted above. I also acknowledge that I have read and agree to the Method of Payment and the GIS Data Disclaimer. Signature Date
